name: Watershed
description:
Watershed is the enterprise sustainability platform. Companies like Airbnb, Carlyle Group, Everlane, YETI, and BBVA use Watershed to reduce emissions, meet customer, investor and regulatory requirements, and modernize their sustainability programs. 

With offices in San Francisco, New York, and London, and remote employees across the US and Europe, we’re growing fast and hiring for a variety of roles! Explore all of our open opportunities at watershed.com/jobs.
slogan: The enterprise sustainability platform helping companies measure, report, and reduce their environmental impact.
